apple_vendor_description: The man gesturing OK emoji on Apple devices showcases a man with a dark skin tone, his hand raised with the thumb and index finger forming a perfect circle, while the other fingers are extended.  Apple's meticulous design imbues this emoji with a satisfyingly tactile quality, thanks to its glossy 3D rendering and realistic lighting that accentuates the gentle curve of his smile.  It‚Äôs a universally understood symbol of agreement, satisfaction, or everything being alright, communicated with a friendly, approachable vibe.
